lead_paragraph: U.S. Open champion Dustin Johnson will make a rare foray on the European Tour when he plays at the Abu Dhabi Championship in January.

headline.print_headline: Johnson to Join McIlroy, Stenson in Strong Abu Dhabi Field
headline.main: Johnson to Join McIlroy, Stenson in Strong Abu Dhabi Field
